headline: This Giant Defense Stock Is Trading at New All-Time Highs
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) is a leading aerospace and defense innovator, showing strong technical momentum and consistent price appreciation. LHX maintains a 100% “Buy” opinion from Barchart. Shares are up 26% in the past year and are trading at all-time highs. LHX’s growth outlook and broad investor support reinforce its favorable...

headline: RTX Wins $1.7B Deal to Supply LTAMDS Radar System to US Army & Poland
summary: RTX gets a $1.7 billion LTAMDS radar deal from the U.S. Army and Poland. The deal opens an opportunity for more international orders.
